text: Puducherry (formerly known as "Pondicherry") is a Union Territory of India. Governance and administration of the territory fall directly under federal authority. ==List== Name Took office Left office 1 14 Oct 1963 13 Oct 1968 2 14 Oct 1968 7 Nov 1972 3 8 Nov 1972 29 Aug 1976 4 30 Aug 1976 31 Oct 1980 5 1 Nov 1980 26 Jul 1981 6 27 Jul 1981 14 May 1982 7 15 May 1982 5 Aug 1983 8 2 Sep 1983 17 Jun 1984 9 1 Oct 1984 21 Jun 1988 10 22 Jun 1988 19 Feb 1990 11 19 Feb 1990 18 Dec 1990 12 19 Dec 1990 05 Feb 1993 13 06 Feb 1993 1 May 1995 14 31 May 1993 1 May 1995 15 2 May 1995 22 Apr 1998 16 23 Apr 1998 29 Jul 2002 17 31 Jul 2002 27 Oct 2003 18 27 Oct 2003 5 Jan 2004 19 5 Jan 2004 6 Jul 2004 20 7 Jul 2004 18 Jul 2006 21 19 Jul 2006 12 Mar 2008 22 15 Mar 2008 22 Jul 2008 23 23 Jul 2008 6 Apr 2009 24 9 Apr 2009 27 Jul 2009 25 27 Jul 2009 9 Jul 2013 26 10 Jul 2013 11 Jul 2014 27 12 Jul 2014 26 May 2016 28 28 May 2016 (incumbent) ==Notes== ==References==
